title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect addition to your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. With its sleek black design, this indoor electric heater is not only functional but also adds a touch of style to any space.

Experience intuitive control with the easy-to-use control knob on the right side. Choose from three modes: "I" for gentle warmth at 750 watts, "II" for faster and hotter heat at 1500 watts, or switch to "Fan" for cool air circulation. Fine-tune the temperature with the thermostat knob on the left, ensuring optimal comfort with precision.

Safety is a top priority with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. With built-in overheat protection and tip-over protection, you can have peace of mind knowing that the heater will automatically shut off if it reaches a preset temperature or if it is accidentally overturned or tilted beyond 45 degrees. Your safety, and the safety of your loved ones, is our utmost concern.

Despite its compact size of 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing only 2.6 pounds, this mini heater is powerful. Powered by ceramic technology, it delivers quick heating within 2 seconds, warming up a 200-square-foot space in no time. By efficiently heating specific areas instead of the entire house, you can save on electricity bills. Take it with you wherever you go - whether it's your bedroom, living room, study, or office, enjoy the convenience of portability.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater utilizes advanced ceramic technology with a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element. This ensures superior stability, rapid heat generation, dependable performance, and optimum safety. Its low thermal resistance allows for swift heat exchange without any visible redness on the heater's surface, reducing the risk of burns, fire hazards, and other safety concerns. It truly is the ideal electric heating component available on the market today.

Not only does the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater provide powerful and efficient heating, but it also operates at noise levels below 45 dB. This means you can enjoy a peaceful and comfortable ambiance without any disturbance. Use it in your bedroom while sleeping and experience a cozy and quiet environment.

Choose the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat for superior performance, enhanced safety features, and convenient portability. Add warmth and comfort to any space with this stylish and reliable indoor electric heater.

Easily adjust the heat settings using the control knob on the right side. Choose between "I" for gentle warmth at 750 watts or "II" for faster and hotter heat at 1500 watts. Need some cool air circulation? Simply switch to "Fan" mode. And with the thermostat knob on the left, you can fine-tune the temperature to your exact comfort level. 

Safety is our top priority. That's why this heater is equipped with built-in overheat protection and tip-over protection. The thermostat control automatically shuts off the heater when it reaches a preset temperature, ensuring your safety and preventing overheating. And if the heater is accidentally overturned or tilted beyond 45 degrees, it instantly cuts off power, providing peace of mind for you and your loved ones.

It truly is the ideal electric heating component available today.
